title: Extending the Borders of your Destiny
description: The degree to which a man can be used by God in the fulfilment of divine purpose is largely dependent on how far he can see and believe God’s promises. The good news is that we are not confined to a degree of faith and thereby have the liberty to accomplish great things for God.

title: Contend for the Supernatural
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Birthing Souls in Prayers
description: Prayer must be a consistent feature in the life of a soul winner. It is what breaks spiritual barriers that hinder soul-winning in cities and softens the resistance in the hearts of people, making them receptive to the message of the gospel.

title: The Missionary Christian
description: The Missionary Christian is one who has put God’s desires and purposes for his existence above his desire for pleasure and earthly accomplishments. This mission-focused mindset is what stamps us in eternity as people of impact and relevance.

title: Taking Over Territories
description: God has empowered every believer to take over places and influence systems on earth for His glory.

title: Bringing God’s Move to a Generation 2
description: Believers are God’s ordained vessels for transformation on earth. However, to fulfill this calling, we must shift our focus from mere survival to deliberately committing to birth God’s purpose in our cities, communities, sectors and nations.

title: Bringing God’s Move to a Generation
description: Believers are God’s ordained vessels for transformation on earth. However, to fulfill this calling, we must shift our focus from mere survival to deliberately committing to birth God’s purpose in our cities, communities, sectors and nations.

title: Ruling by the Word 10: The Word of Life
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence.

title: Ruling by the Word 9
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence.

title: Ruling by the Word 8: The Word of His Grace
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence

title: Ruling by the Word 4: The Word of Reconciliation
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence.

title: Ruling by the Word 3
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence.

title: Ruling by the Word 2
description: By God’s design, the believer is to rule and have dominion on earth. We are called to determine the culture of our sectors and nations. One way God ensures this happens is by granting us wisdom from His word to navigate the systems of the world and rise into prominence.

title: The Power of God 5
description: An effective believer is one who knows how to actively engage and demonstrate the power of God. It is not enough to simply acknowledge its existence, we must manifest God’s power in every aspect of our lives, to the end that His glory might shine through us.

title: The Power of God 4
description: An effective believer is one who knows how to actively engage and demonstrate the power of God. It is not enough to simply acknowledge its existence, we must manifest God’s power in every aspect of our lives, to the end that His glory might shine through us.

title: The Power of God 3
description: An effective believer is one who knows how to actively engage and demonstrate the power of God. It is not enough to simply acknowledge its existence, we must manifest God’s power in every aspect of our lives, to the end that His glory might shine through us.

title: Realizing Your Dominion in Christ 2
description: As believers, we rise and rule by being conscious of who we are and what we have in Christ. We are not striving for victory, it is already ours by inheritance, but we must know how to walk in it.

title: Realizing Your Dominion in Christ
description: As believers, we rise and rule by being conscious of who we are in Christ. We are not striving for victory, it is already ours by inheritance, but we must know how to walk in it.

title: The Power of God 2
description: An effective believer is one who knows how to actively engage and demonstrate the power of God. It is not enough to simply acknowledge its existence, we must manifest God’s power in every aspect of our lives, to the end that His glory might shine through us.

title: The Power of God 1
description: An effective believer is one who knows how to actively engage and demonstrate the power of God. It is not enough to simply acknowledge its existence, we must manifest God’s power in every aspect of our lives, to the end that His glory might shine through us.

title: Opening Up Places 4
description: God desires that the gospel be spread across the earth. Hence, as God’s children, we must see to it that people and places are reached through us by the preaching of the gospel and that the culture of God’s kingdom is established everywhere we go.

title: Opening Up Places 3
description: God desires that the gospel be spread across the earth. Hence, as God’s children, we must see to it that people and places are reached through us by the preaching of the gospel and that the culture of God’s kingdom is established everywhere we go.

title: Opening Up Places 2
description: God desires that the gospel be spread across the earth. Hence, as God’s children, we must see to it that people and places are reached through us by the preaching of the gospel and that the culture of God’s kingdom is established everywhere we go.

title: Opening Up Places
description: God desires that the gospel be spread across the earth. Hence, as God’s children, we must see to it that people and places are reached through us by the preaching of the gospel and that the culture of God’s kingdom is established everywhere we go.

title: Rising as Princes
description: God wants to put every believer at the centre of influence, in positions where they can order the direction of sectors and nations in alignment with God’s plans and purposes. When we come into these positions, it is important that we remember that we are there for the advancement of God’s kingdom.

title: The Ruling Power of Priesthood
description: When a man gets saved he becomes destined to rule and reign in life. However, for this to happen tangibly, he must partner with God in ensuring this happens through prayers, fasting and giving to God’s kingdom.

title: Keys to Rulership and Escalated Favour
description: The believer is to reign on earth and in life and enjoy unlimited favour that comes with overwhelming prosperity. While this is God’s provision for us, we have a part to play in seeing this provision become our reality.

title: The Priesthood of the Believer
description: The sacrifice of Jesus gives us the liberty to partner with God and make changes on the earth and in our lives in the place of prayer. This ability, which is identified in scripture as the exercise of priesthood, requires our active participation.

title: Rulership and Favour
description: God is raising an army of people ready to take territories and rise as agents of the gospel. God places these people in positions of rulership by His favour for this cause. Through them, the world shall witness infallible proofs of God’s power and bow in awe of His glory, thereby leading to the salvation of many.

title: The Power of the Blessing 3
description: The blessing of God may not always seem tangible but it is powerfully at work in our lives as believers, manifesting as favour, honour, wisdom, as well as timely opportunities. Understanding how the blessing works enables us to believe to see it at work in our lives more deliberately, thereby recording extraordinary results in our affairs.

title: The Power of the Blessing 2
description: The blessing of God may not always seem tangible but it is powerfully at work in our lives as believers, manifesting as favour, honour, wisdom, as well as timely opportunities. Understanding how the blessing works enables us to believe to see it at work in our lives more deliberately, thereby recording extraordinary results in our affairs.

title: The Power of the Blessing
description: The blessing of God may not always be tangible but it is powerfully at work in our lives as believers, manifesting as favour, honour, wisdom, as well as timely opportunities. Understanding how the blessing works enables us to believe to see it at work in our lives more deliberately, thereby recording extraordinary results in our affairs.

title: Moving from Captivity to Joy
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Receiving the Spoils of Cities
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Enforcing Victory 2
description: The sacrifice of Christ destroyed the works of the devil and gave us victory on earth. By this, we have been set free to thrive and prosper in our health, finances and every other area of life. However, for us to see the manifestations of this victory constantly in our lives, we must actively enforce it in our affairs.

title: Exercising Authority Over Discouraging Voices
description: Discouragement, whether it through difficult situations or thoughts can sometimes challenge us. While we cannot always prevent discouraging circumstances and occurences, we have all the authority to deal with them and ensure they do not hold us back.

title: Enforcing Victory
description: The sacrifice of Christ destroyed the works of the devil and gave us victory on earth. By this, we have been set free to thrive and prosper in our health, finances and every other area of life. However, for us to see the manifestations of this victory constantly in our lives, we must actively enforce it our affairs.

title: Breaking into Your High Places
description: Promotion does not come from the East or the West, it comes from God. It is only God that can truly lift a man from a place of obscurity and position him in high places of influence and honour.

title: Holding the Command of the Earth
description: Every believer has been entrusted with a divine mandate of dominion – a commission to exercise our rulership and authority in every sector and city we occupy. This is what gives us the authority to shape the world according to God’s purpose.

title: Global Gospel Institutions
description: God has entrusted us with the vision of evangelising the world – calling us to penetrate every sphere of influence on Earth to make Christ known until the kingdoms of this world become the Kingdom of our Lord and of His Christ.

title: Miracles that Defy Limitations
description: God’s desire is to constantly do great and immeasurable things for us. While His acts may sometimes be limited by our thinking and traditions, He continually works in our affairs regardless of these limitations by His mercy – thereby performing miracles that defy our imagination and limitations.

title: Revayah – Overwhelming Abundance
description: As believers, we have vast riches in God and a limitless supply of wealth that is not constrained by the economic conditions of this world. Our provisions in every situation are based on God’s never-ending riches, which have been made available to us in Christ Jesus.

title: Ascent of Prosperity
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: The Power of Giving 2
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: The Power of Giving
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Breaking Free from Smallness
description: One of the most important principles of prosperity is starting where we are, even if it is modest. While we should not shy away from starting from where we are, we must not stay stagnant in size, influence and impact.

title: Stepping into Higher Thresholds of God’s Prosperity
description: When God wants to give us greater results and increased prosperity, He gives us more grace (i.e. divine empowerment that causes us to stand out in the midst of many and produce superior results). One of the major ways this increase in grace comes is when we earnestly desire and receive from the abundance of grace he has given to His servants over us.

title: Prophetic Breath for Miracles
description: There are various ways miracles happen in our lives as believers. One of these is the release of Prophetic breath- the power of God released through words, that breaks unyielding problems and turns impossible situations around.

title: The Breakthrough of the Righteous
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: The Lifting Power of Our Union with the Triune God
description: Through the scriptures, we see the expression of the God-Head, made up of the Father, the Son (Jesus Christ), and the Holy Spirit, each one of them having their distinct roles and functions. Our understanding of these roles and functions is essential for maximising the lifting power that emanates from our union with them.

title: Accessing Opportunities for Wealth
description: As believers, our prosperity has been guaranteed by the sacrifice of Jesus Christ on the cross. However, as seen in the scriptures, enjoying this prosperity God has in store for us requires deliberately embracing and applying the wisdom of God in our affairs,

title: Commanding the Obedience of Systems
description: As believers, we have been called to subdue the earth; this means taking command of every space we occupy, not merely conforming to their existing systems of operations. We fulfil this call when we rise up in the places we are and exercise the spiritual authority Christ has given to us over the systems and the works of darkness in them.

title: Actualizing Prosperity
description: Prosperity is part of the benefits we have received by the sacrifice of Jesus. However, as with everything God has given us in Christ Jesus, we have a part to play in ensuring it manifests in our lives in full strength.

title: Lighting Up Dark Areas of Life
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Destiny Places of Enlargement
description: As we progress in life’s journey, we all get to certain points where we are faced with situations that can alter the trajectory of our lives. They may be moments of distress, the start of a new phase or situations that require the mighty hand of God to intervene by bringing us miracles. At these moments, we need to become bigger than the situations before us if we will move towards God’s desired outcome for our lives.

title: The Making of Mighty Men
description: God’s word contains the power to transform any life, break any bondage, heal any disease and deliver great victories to anyone who will receive it. To receive and enjoy all of these and the many other benefits encapsulated in God’s word, it is important to receive the word of God with an open heart.

title: Miracles That Startle the Imagination
description: The Bible is filled with accounts of God performing miracles that defy human logic. Even today, He continues to work in miraculous ways, giving His people unbelievable testimonies that cause them to marvel.
